modName: Dandelion the Bard from The Witcher 3 - racemenu preset
summary: A racemenu preset of Dandelion aka Jaskier aka Julian Alfred Pankratz from The Witcher 3, because he needs more love
descriptionHtml:
[center]﻿
[color=#ffe599][b][font=Times New Roman][size=6]"[/size][/font][/b][font=Times New Roman][size=4][i]Dandelion: Then bold Foltest uttered these words: "Virtous Radovid..."
Geralt of Rivia: What the hell is that?
Dandelion: I'm trying to keep a faithful and accurate record of these events.
Geralt of Rivia: He said, "Stop deliberating, son, we need to put out the fire in this whorehouse".
Dandelion: Geralt, you have no sense of poetry. There's the truth of time and the truth of legend...[/i][/size][/font][font=Times New Roman][size=6]"[/size][/font][/color][/center]



Julian Alfred Pankratz, better known as Dandelion or Jaskier, is a poet, minstrel, bard, aspiring spy and a close friend of Gerald of Rivia and one of my favourite characters from the Witcher series and I just thought that it would be great if he could put Dragonborn on his roster of occupations :)

The outfit is VS Witcher 3 Dandelion Bard Outfit by ViciousSARR

[b]Installation:[/b]
drop the file manually into Data/SKSE/Plugins/CharGen/Presets

[b]Requirements:[/b]
Racemenu

[b]For him to look the same youll need:[/b]
KS Hairdos
Fine Face Textures for Men


Enjoy :)

Thanks to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2950481]expired6978[/url] for creating Racemenu.
Thanks to ViciousSARR for the gorgeous outfit.
author: Julia111
